>>> import os
>>> from releasemanager.tests import TEST_CONF_PATH
>>> from releasemanager.builder.buildhost import BuildHost
>>> bh = BuildHost('build_host_template', configPath=os.path.join(TEST_CONF_PATH, "builder"))
>>> status, resource = bh.build('template', trunk=True, unique="test_build_host_build")
>>> status
True
>>> bh.report()
['release_builder_template']
